seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory

target.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory

seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory

target.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory

seg-source.mrk: tmp directory

target.mrk: tmp directory

seg-source.mrk: setting location for

target.mrk: setting location for

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Defines the location on disk for temporary file space needed by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for performing large sorts and deferred deletes and updates. (Temporary files are automatically deleted after use, and are removed when the database restarts after a crash.) The temporary directory named by this property will be created if it does not exist, but will not be deleted when the system shuts down. The path name specified by this property must have file separators that are appropriate to the current operating system.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the location on disk for temporary file space needed by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for performing large sorts and deferred deletes and updates.

(Temporary files are automatically deleted after use, and are removed when the database restarts after a crash.) The temporary directory named by this property will be created if it does not exist, but will not be deleted when the system shuts down.
The path name specified by this property must have file separators that are appropriate to the current operating system.

target.mrk: Defines the location on disk for temporary file space needed by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for performing large sorts and deferred deletes and updates.

(Temporary files are automatically deleted after use, and are removed when the database restarts after a crash.) The temporary directory named by this property will be created if it does not exist, but will not be deleted when the system shuts down.
The path name specified by this property must have file separators that are appropriate to the current operating system.

trans-unit.source: This property allows databases located on read-only media to write temporary files to a writable location. If this property is not set, databases located on read-only media might get an error like the following:

seg-source.mrk: This property allows databases located on read-only media to write temporary files to a writable location.
If this property is not set, databases located on read-only media might get an error like the following:

target.mrk: This property allows databases located on read-only media to write temporary files to a writable location.
If this property is not set, databases located on read-only media might get an error like the following:

trans-unit.source: ERROR XSDF1: Exception during creation of file c:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp for container ERROR XJ001: Java exception: 'a:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp: java.io.IOException'.

seg-source.mrk: ERROR XSDF1: Exception during creation of file c:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp for container ERROR XJ001: Java exception: 'a:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp: java.io.IOException'.

target.mrk: ERROR XSDF1: Exception during creation of file c:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp for container ERROR XJ001: Java exception: 'a:\databases\db\tmp\T887256591756.tmp: java.io.IOException'.

trans-unit.source: This property moves the temporary directories for all databases being used by the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system. <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> makes temporary directories for each database under the directory referenced by this property. For example, if the property is set as follows:

seg-source.mrk: This property moves the temporary directories for all databases being used by the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> makes temporary directories for each database under the directory referenced by this property.
For example, if the property is set as follows:

target.mrk: This property moves the temporary directories for all databases being used by the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> makes temporary directories for each database under the directory referenced by this property.
For example, if the property is set as follows:

seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory=C:/Temp/dbtemp

target.mrk: derby.storage.tempDirectory=C:/Temp/dbtemp

trans-unit.source: the temporary directories for the databases in C:\databases\db1 and C:\databases\db2 will be in C:\Temp\dbtemp\db1 and C:\Temp\dbtemp\db2, respectively.

seg-source.mrk: the temporary directories for the databases in C:\databases\db1 and C:\databases\db2 will be in C:\Temp\dbtemp\db1 and C:\Temp\dbtemp\db2, respectively.

target.mrk: the temporary directories for the databases in C:\databases\db1 and C:\databases\db2 will be in C:\Temp\dbtemp\db1 and C:\Temp\dbtemp\db2, respectively.

trans-unit.source: The temporary files of two databases running concurrently with the same name (for example, C:\databases\db1 and E:\databases\db1) will conflict with each other if the derby.storage.tempDirectory property is set. This will cause incorrect results, so users are advised to give databases unique names.

seg-source.mrk: The temporary files of two databases running concurrently with the same name (for example, C:\databases\db1 and E:\databases\db1) will conflict with each other if the derby.storage.tempDirectory property is set.
This will cause incorrect results, so users are advised to give databases unique names.

target.mrk: The temporary files of two databases running concurrently with the same name (for example, C:\databases\db1 and E:\databases\db1) will conflict with each other if the derby.storage.tempDirectory property is set.
This will cause incorrect results, so users are advised to give databases unique names.

seg-source.mrk: Default

target.mrk: Default

trans-unit.source: A subdirectory named tmp under the database directory.

seg-source.mrk: A subdirectory named tmp under the database directory.

target.mrk: A subdirectory named tmp under the database directory.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the database db1 is stored in C:\databases\db1, the temporary files are created in C:\databases\db1\tmp.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the database db1 is stored in C:\databases\db1, the temporary files are created in C:\databases\db1\tmp.

target.mrk: For example, if the database db1 is stored in C:\databases\db1, the temporary files are created in C:\databases\db1\tmp.

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: -- system-wide property derby.storage.tempDirectory=c:/Temp/dbtemp -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.tempDirectory', 'c:/Temp/dbtemp')

seg-source.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.storage.tempDirectory=c:/Temp/dbtemp -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.tempDirectory', 'c:/Temp/dbtemp')

target.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.storage.tempDirectory=c:/Temp/dbtemp -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.tempDirectory', 'c:/Temp/dbtemp')

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: This property is static; you must restart <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for a change to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: This property is static; you must restart <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for a change to take effect.

target.mrk: This property is static; you must restart <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for a change to take effect.
